page.title: 09St Martin's Church Talke
page.content: Saint Martin's Church is not a very old church.My school had their harvest festival service there and my Auntie is buried there.The church is built out of stones and brick,with a short brick tower.Inside the church,as you go in through a door at the west end where the tower is,there is a staircase going up to the balcony and two big cupboards which have hymn books in them.Then,if you keep on walking,you go between the wooden pews in the aisle.To your left there is a piano and some chairs,there is an organ as well.Then there is the altar,at the east end of the church, with a carved wooden figure on each side.There are windows decorated with coloured glass,one is about a mining disaster that happened in Talke a long time ago.Behind the church there is a large,overgrown graveyard, which is still used for burials.
